#summary Current limitations on the instrumentation

= List of limitations =

A list of limitations that exist in the current instrumentation:
  * No superclasses containing state with a @TmEntity
  * No constructors calling self constructors with a @TmEntity
  * No direct field initialization in @TmEntities (do everything in constructor)
  * No @atomic and checked exceptions
  * No @atomic abstract methods
  * No @atomic native methods
